Training.description: Learn the basics of Automation Decision Services through practical examples.

MachineLearningCustomerLoyalty.description: Use machine learning to reduce customer churn rate.

Banking.description: Validate loans and compute insurance rates for the requested loan.

Compensation.description: Calculate sales commissions based on compensation policies.

Pricing.description: Calculate shipping price after applicable discount.

Telecom.description: Determine the best offer to make to customers to reduce churn rate.
